Anchor Carbon example screens:

production k8s

https://carbon.now.sh/?bg=rgba%28255%2C255%2C255%2C1%29&t=material&wt=none&l=text&width=680&ds=false&dsyoff=20px&dsblur=68px&wc=true&wa=true&pv=56px&ph=56px&ln=false&fl=1&fm=Fira+Code&fs=14px&lh=152%25&si=false&es=2x&wm=false&code=%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%255C%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%257C%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520_%2520%255C%2520%2520%2520%2520__%2520%255C%2520%2520%2520%2520__%257C%2520%2520__%2520%255C%2520%2520%2520%2520_%2520%255C%2520%2520%2520%2520__%257C%2520%250A%2520%2520%2520___%2520%255C%2520%2520%2520%257C%2520%2520%2520%257C%2520%2520%28%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%257C%2520%257C%2520%257C%2520%2520%28%2520%2520%2520%257C%2520%2520%257C%2520%2520%2520%2520%250A%2520_%252F%2520%2520%2520%2520_%255C%2520_%257C%2520%2520_%257C%2520%255C___%257C%2520_%257C%2520%257C_%257C%2520%255C___%252F%2520%2520_%257C%250A%250ASearch%2520production%2520%253A%2520%25E2%2596%2588%250A%250A%2520%2520%2520back%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%250A%2520%2520%2520workflows...%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%250A%2520%2520%2520ElasticSearch%253A%2520Install%2520Master%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%28No-Op%2520action%252C%2520used%2520as%2520an%2520example%29%250A%2520%2520%2520ElasticSearch%253A%2520Install%2520Nodes%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%28No-Op%2520action%252C%2520used%2520as%2520an%2520example%29%250A%2520%2520%25F0%259F%2591%2589%2520Kubernetes%253A%2520Adjust%2520build%2520agents%2520replica%2520limits%2520%2520%2520%28No-Op%2520action%252C%2520used%2520as%2520an%2520example%29%250A%250AInformation%253A%250A%250A%2520%2520Id%253A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520k8s-build-agents-replicas%250A%2520%2520Run%2520Command%253A%2520%2520%2520anchor%2520team-infra%2520run%2520production%2520--action%253Dk8s-build-agents-replicas%250A%2520%2520Context%253A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520kubernetes%2520%250A%2520%2520Script%253A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%28hidden%29%250A%2520%2520Description%253A%2520%2520%2520Prompt%2520for%2520mixReplica%252FmaxReplica%2520and%2520update%2520the%2520cluster.%250A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520GCP%2520Cloud%2520Provider%253A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2580%25A2%2520Region%253A%2520us-west1%250A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520Authentication%253A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2580%25A2%2520Method%253A%2520gcloud%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2580%25A2%2520Creds%2520path%253A%2520%252Fpath%252Fto%252Fsecret%252Ffile%250A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520Kubernetes%253A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2580%25A2%2520Namespace%253A%2520buildkite%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2580%25A2%2520Agent-queue%253A%2520master-builds


build bazel repo example:

https://carbon.now.sh/?bg=rgba%28255%2C255%2C255%2C1%29&t=material&wt=none&l=text&width=680&ds=false&dsyoff=20px&dsblur=68px&wc=true&wa=true&pv=56px&ph=56px&ln=false&fl=1&fm=Fira+Code&fs=14px&lh=152%25&si=false&es=2x&wm=false&code=%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%255C%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%257C%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520_%2520%255C%2520%2520%2520%2520__%2520%255C%2520%2520%2520%2520__%257C%2520%2520__%2520%255C%2520%2520%2520%2520_%2520%255C%2520%2520%2520%2520__%257C%2520%250A%2520%2520%2520___%2520%255C%2520%2520%2520%257C%2520%2520%2520%257C%2520%2520%28%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%257C%2520%257C%2520%257C%2520%2520%28%2520%2520%2520%257C%2520%2520%257C%2520%2520%2520%2520%250A%2520_%252F%2520%2520%2520%2520_%255C%2520_%257C%2520%2520_%257C%2520%255C___%257C%2520_%257C%2520%257C_%257C%2520%255C___%252F%2520%2520_%257C%250A%250ASearch%2520bazel%2520%253A%2520%25E2%2596%2588%250A%250A%2520%2520%2520back%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%250A%2520%2520%25F0%259F%2591%2589%2520Bazel%253A%2520Start%2520a%2520new%2520build%2520%2520%2520%28No-Op%2520action%252C%2520used%2520as%2520an%2520example%29%250A%250AInformation%253A%250A%250A%2520%2520Id%253A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520build-bazel-repository%250A%2520%2520Run%2520Command%253A%2520%2520%2520anchor%2520team-build%2520run%2520bazel%2520--action%253Dbuild-bazel-repository%250A%2520%2520Script%2520File%253A%2520%2520%2520build-team%252Fbazel%252Fscripts%252Fbuild-repository.sh%2520%2524%257BUSER%257D%250A%2520%2520Description%253A%2520%2520%2520Issue%2520a%2520new%2520Bazel%2520build.%250A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520Build%2520agents%253A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2580%25A2%2520Queue%2520name%253A%2520master-builds%250A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520Environment%2520vars%253A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2580%25A2%2520RC_FILE_PATH%2520-%2520RC%2520file%2520location%2520%28default%253A%2520%7E%252F.bazelrc%29%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2580%25A2%2520GIT_REPO%2520-%2520Git%2520repo%2520URL%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2580%25A2%2520BRANCH%2520-%2520git%2520branch%2520%28default%253A%2520master%29%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2580%25A2%2520INVOCATION_ID%2520-%2520build%2520invocation

config context selection:

https://carbon.now.sh/?bg=rgba%28255%2C255%2C255%2C1%29&t=material&wt=none&l=text&width=680&ds=false&dsyoff=20px&dsblur=68px&wc=true&wa=true&pv=56px&ph=56px&ln=false&fl=1&fm=Fira+Code&fs=14px&lh=152%25&si=false&es=2x&wm=false&code=PLEASE%2520SELECT%2520CONFIG%2520CONTEXT%253A%250A%250AUse%2520the%2520arrow%2520keys%2520to%2520navigate%253A%2520%25E2%2586%2593%2520%25E2%2586%2591%2520%25E2%2586%2592%2520%25E2%2586%2590%2520%2520and%2520%252F%2520toggles%2520search%250A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520cancel%250A%2520%2520%25F0%259F%2591%2589%2520ops-team%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520blog-remote%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520playground%250A%250AHint%253A%250ALock%2520the%2520selected%2520config%2520context%2520as%2520the%2520active%2520one%2520using%253A%250A%2520%2520%25E2%2580%25A2%2520anchor%2520config%2520use-context%2520ops-team


anchor auto-update flow:

https://carbon.now.sh/?bg=rgba%28255%2C255%2C255%2C1%29&t=material&wt=none&l=text&width=680&ds=false&dsyoff=20px&dsblur=68px&wc=true&wa=true&pv=56px&ph=56px&ln=false&fl=1&fm=Fira+Code&fs=14px&lh=152%25&si=false&es=2x&wm=false&code=%25E2%259C%2594%2520Read%2520remote%2520repository%2520HEAD%2520commmit-hash%250A%25E2%259C%2594%2520Reset%2520to%2520revision%2520f634a4c91f370ea9ee422a9fc718d0e93318971e%250A%250ACommits%253A%250A%250A*%2520f634a4c%2520%2520%255BRemote%2520Dev%255D%2520Introduce%2520Infracosts%2520to%2520Terraform%2520plan%2520%282022-06-06%29%2520%253CZachi%2520Nachshon%253E%250A*%25201ea5588%2520%2520%255BBuildkite%255D%2520Update%2520build%2520agent%2520default%2520limits%2520%282022-06-05%29%2520%253CZachi%2520Nachshon%253E%250A*%25204210250%2520%2520%255BJenkins%255D%2520Update%2520master%2520server%2520Dockerfile%2520%282022-06-05%29%2520%253CZachi%2520Nachshon%253E%250A%250AAnchor%2520your%2520Ops%2520environment%2520into%2520a%2520version%2520controlled%2520repository%250A%250AUsage%253A%250A%2520%2520anchor%2520%255Bcommand%255D%250A%250AAvailable%2520Commands%253A%250A%2520%2520completion%2520%2520Generate%2520auto%2520completion%2520script%2520for%2520%255Bbash%252C%2520zsh%255D%250A%2520%2520config%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520Configuration%2520file%2520management%250A%2520%2520help%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520Help%2520about%2520any%2520command%250A%2520%2520team-build%2520%2520Build%2520team%2520CI%252FCD%2520actions%250A%2520%2520team-infra%2520%2520Infrastructure%2520team%2520provisioning%2520actions%250A%2520%2520version%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520Print%2520anchor%2520CLI%2520version%250A%250AFlags%253A%250A%2520%2520-h%252C%2520--help%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520help%2520for%2520anchor%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520--no-auto-update%2520%2520%2520anchor%2520%253Ccommand%253E%2520--no-auto-update%250A%2520%2520-v%252C%2520--verbose%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520anchor%2520% anchor fixed sub-commands:

anchor command example -

s%253A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2580%25A2%2520install-jenkins-master%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2580%25A2%2520install-jenkins-agents
